title: MPfree: Star Slinger – Moet & Reese
content:
It’s been a while since we heard from Mancunian beat maestro Star Slinger, however that’s not to say he hasn’t been grafting as hard as ever.

Having just finished a full US tour with pals Shlohmo, Shigeto and Mux Mool, Darren’s even found time to drop a beat that he pieced together whilst on the road. Moet & Reese is trademark Slinger; wonderfully frenetic and danceable. With his debut single proper Dumbin’ released last month, and a remix from Diplo on the way, 2012 is going to be another stellar year for SS.

Star Slinger – Moet & Reese by Star Slinger
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
